article_title: Ralph Nader Assembling New Shareholder-Activism Group
article_text:
Ralph Nader, the longtime consumer advocate, is opening a new front in his corporate-reform crusade.

Mr. Nader, who grabbed headlines last week when he came out against Liberty Media Corp.'s takeover bid for Sirius XM Holdings Inc., said in an interview that he's seeking to put together a shareholder-activism group. As part of that effort, the 79-year-old has pledged 1% of his financial net worth, or roughly $50,000, in each of the next three years if a group of 15 to 20 others will join him to raise a total of about $10...
